laboratory_examinations.findings: PRL concentration ranged from 1360 to 4102 ng/mL (59,130 to 178,347 pmol/L), normal for age 3.5 to 16 ng/mL (152 to 696 pmol/L)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: PRL was 1585 ng/mL (68,913 pmol/L) at 15 months, decreased to 37 ng/mL (1609 pmol/L) post-surgery, then rose again to 151 ng/mL (6578 pmol/L) at 28 months.

laboratory_examinations.findings: GH concentration ranged from 27 to 142 ng/mL (27 to 142 mg/L), normal for age, #5 ng/mL (#5 mg/L)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: GH was 436 ng/mL (436 mg/L) at 15 months, decreased to 2.3 ng/mL (2.3 mg/L) post-surgery, then rose again to 6.1 ng/mL (6.1 mg/L) at 28 months.

laboratory_examinations.findings: IGF-1 concentration ranged from <25 to 159 ng/mL (<3 to 21 nmol/L), normal for age, 27 to 157 ng/mL (4 to 21 nmol/L)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: IGF-1 was 243 ng/mL (32 nmol/L) at 15 months, decreased to 146 ng/mL (19 nmol/L) post-surgery, then rose to 189 ng/mL (25 nmol/L) at 28 months.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Random cortisol measurement was 25 mg/dL (690 nmol/L), within normal limits.
Heterogeneously enhancing mass arising from the sella with suprasellar extension measuring 8.1 x 37.5 x 10.7 mm.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: At 3.5 months, the tumor size increased to 9.0 x 31.0 x 12.0 mm; at 10 months, it was 12.5 x 12.5 x 15.1 mm.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Ki-67 proliferation index was 8.5% in the infant and 5.6% in the mother, with neoplastic cells arranged in trabeculae and glandular structures.
